snippet: The playful political upheaval is held in Ibi every year, but the satire has been imbued with outsize significance amid scores of fraud scandals around Spain.
abstract: Ibi Journal; annual mock coup that takes place in Ibi, Spain, in which mayor is humorously deposed for span of eight hours has special significance in wake of strong showing of new leftist party Podemos in Spanish vote for European Parliament; Spain's many recent corruption scandals and actual ouster of several mayors has led to record levels of dissatisfaction with government.
lead_paragraph: The playful political upheaval is held in Ibi every year, but the satire has been imbued with outsize significance amid scores of fraud scandals around Spain.

headline.main: Fueled by Rotten Eggs, an Annual Mock Coup Mirrors Spain’s Mood
headline.print_headline: Fueled by Rotten Eggs, an Annual Mock Coup Mirrors Spain’s Mood
